diff_hunk:
@@ -4290,6 +4290,58 @@
     [torch.LongTensor of size (4,)]
 """)
 
+add_docstr(torch.tensor,
+           r"""
+tensor(data, dtype=None, device=None, requires_grad=False) -> Tensor
+
+Constructs a tensor with :attr:`data`.
+
+Args:
+    data (array_like): Initial data for the tensor. Can be a list, tuple,
+        numpy array, scalar, and other types.
+    dtype (:class:`torch.dtype`, optional): the desired type of returned tensor.
+        Default: if None, infers data type from :attr:`data`.
+    device (:class:`torch.device`, optional): the desired device of returned tensor.
+        Default: if None, uses the current device for the default tensor type
+        (see :func:`torch.set_default_tensor_type`). :attr:`device` will be the CPU
+        for CPU tensor types and the current CUDA device for CUDA tensor types.
+    requires_grad (bool, optional): If autograd should record operations on the
+        returned tensor. Default: ``False``.
+
body: We could also add a warning that calling this with another tensor will copy it.

body_text: We could also add a warning that calling this with another tensor will copy it.
